Text: Spring into Classmates now to visit ClassMatescom today Home Friends Event Center Fun Games Member Benefits Help April Hello Richard Thanks for making Classmates such a success If you havent visited us recently please check out our new Web site now featuring easier navigation faster download times and more communication tools The response has been terrific and more people than ever are reconnecting with old friends Last month alone we added more than million new members And thats million new reasons to upgrade to a Gold membership Classmates Gold members can directly contact any of our more than million friends including alumni from Newington Gold members can send Hi Notes post messages on the Internets liveliest alumni boards or strike up a conversation in the Newington chat room To take advantage of all that Classmates has to offer upgrade your membership now Once again thanks for being part of Classmates With kind regards The Staff at Classmates So now you know whats new with Classmates What you have been up to lately Do you have an exciting new job A vacation planned Even a new hairdo youd like to show off Let your friends know by updating your own personal page at Classmates with a new bio and photo Name at Graduation Richard Shapiro Registration Number School Newington Email Address We hope youve enjoyed receiving this newsletter from your Classmates community if not update your email subscriptions If this email was sent to you in error please remove the incorrect membership View our Privacy Policy IMAGE Youve got questions weve got answers Missing something A few of your favorite Classmates features including Search and Celebrity Yearbooks have moved around a bit Plus weve got a slew of new features But worry not all the answers can be found in our newly enhanced Help section Its where to go for frequently asked questions Member Care contact information and more
